name: Dracula Dire Wolves Location and Turn Count Test
description: Tests that dire wolves appear at Castle Gates only after 3+ scene turns at that location

chat_history.content: I examine the castle gates carefully.

The massive wrought iron gates stand before you, slightly ajar as if inviting you inside. Stone gargoyles perch atop the gate posts, their eyes seeming to follow your movements. The path beyond leads to the imposing castle entrance.
I look around the courtyard area and check my equipment.

You survey the area around the gates. The oppressive atmosphere weighs heavily upon you, and you sense you're being watched from the shadows. You check your leather satchel - wooden stakes, silver cross, and holy water are all accounted for. You're as prepared as you can be for what lies ahead.

steps.name: Wolves appear on turn 3 at Castle Gates
steps.user_prompt: I pause to strike a dramatic pose.

steps.name: Wolves still present at Castle Gates
steps.user_prompt: I observe the wolves carefully, looking for any weakness.

steps.name: No wolves when not at Castle Gates
steps.user_prompt: I carefully move north into the Grand Foyer, away from the wolves.
